committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to extend the period during which certain grazing privileges granted with respect to Federal lands in the Capitol Reef National Park may be exercised.
short_title: Capitol Reef Grazing Relief Act of 1982

summary.text: Capitol Reef Grazing Relief Act of 1982 - Amends the Capitol Reef National Park Act to permit an individual who held grazing privileges on Federal lands within the Capitol Reef National Park in Utah on December 18, 1971, or any member of such individual's immediate family who was living on such date to exercise such grazing privileges for his or her lifetime. (Currently, such grazing privileges may be exercised for the period of the lease, permit, or license issued by the U.S. Government and one period of renewal thereafter.)

titles.title: Capitol Reef Grazing Relief Act of 1982
A bill to extend the period during which certain grazing privileges granted with respect to Federal lands in the Capitol Reef National Park may be exercised.
